import { React, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Form, Button, Row } from "react-bootstrap" const CreateUser = () => { const [newUser, setNewUser] = useState({ name: '', user: '', password: '' }) const saveNewUser = ()=>{ alert(newUser) } return ( <>

Nome Completo: setNewUser({ ...newUser, name: a.target.value })} /> Usuário: setNewUser({ ...newUser, user: a.target.value })} /> Senha: setNewUser({ ...newUser, password: a.target.value })} />
) } export default CreateUser
